string[]: log-control appid < APPID > ctxid < CTXID > level < LEVEL >
log-control level < LEVEL >,                                   Change the loglevel of all process and all module to LEVEL
log-control appid < APPID > level < LEVEL >,                   Change the loglevel of all module of APPID process to LEVEL
log-control ctxid < CTXID > level < LEVEL >,                   Change the loglevel of CTXID module of all app process to LEVEL
log-control appid < APPID > ctxid < CTXID> level < LEVEL >,    Change the loglevel of APPID process and all module to LEVEL
